original_text: Opponents must be gently instructed, in the hope that God will grant them repentance leading them to a knowledge of the truth,
korean_text: 거역하는 자를 온유함으로 훈계할지니 혹 하나님이 그들에게 회개함을 주사 진리를 알게 하실까 하며

sentences.original_text: in the hope that God will grant them repentance
leading them to a knowledge of the truth
